sermons.title: Trusting In Our Own Means Or The Power Of The Holy Spirit
sermons.description: Jim Cymbala shares about how it is very dangerous and grieving to the Lord to trust in our own means and methods in the Church. He clearly shows that we must trust in the work of the Holy Spirit, no method works except God. God works in many ways and desires to get all the glory. May we in North America look towards God afresh for His Spirit's leading in the work of His Gospel and Church.

sermons.title: Why Does God Permit Evil In The World?
sermons.description: Pastor Fuller explains that sometimes we need to trust God 's Holy hand even though we can not see it. Will not the Lord of all the earth do right? We must try and look at things by the eyes of faith from God's perspective.
